name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.ha.tail-edits.rolledits.timeout
description: The timeout in seconds of calling rollEdits RPC on Active NN.

name: dfs.client.mmap.cache.size
description:
When zero-copy reads are used, the DFSClient keeps a cache of recently used
    memory mapped regions.  This parameter controls the maximum number of
    entries that we will keep in that cache.

    The larger this number is, the more file descriptors we will potentially
    use for memory-mapped files.  mmaped files also use virtual address space.
    You may need to increase your ulimit virtual address space limits before
    increasing the client mmap cache size.

    Note that you can still do zero-copy reads when this size is set to 0.

name: dfs.datanode.ec.reconstruct.read.bandwidthPerSec
description:
Specifies the maximum amount of bandwidth that the EC reconstruction can utilize for reading.
      When the bandwidth value is zero, there is no limit.

name: hadoop.security.uid.cache.secs
description:
This is the config controlling the validity of the entries in the cache
        containing the userId to userName and groupId to groupName used by
        NativeIO getFstat().

name: dfs.client.write.byte-array-manager.count-limit
description: The maximum number of arrays allowed for each array length.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.containerlauncher.threadpool-initial-size
description:
The initial size of thread pool to launch containers in the
    app master.

name: mapreduce.job.maxtaskfailures.per.tracker
description:
The number of task-failures on a node manager of a given job
               after which new tasks of that job aren't assigned to it. It
               MUST be less than mapreduce.map.maxattempts and
               mapreduce.reduce.maxattempts otherwise the failed task will
               never be tried on a different node.
